description: In accordance with the Governmental Ethics Ordinance, the Department of Innovation & Technology provides the following list of current and former contractors who, during the preceding four reporting years, received from the City of Chicago payments totaling $10,000 or more in any 12 consecutive months period. The data source for this list is the Financial Management and Purchasing Systems (FMPS).

name: List of Contractors Doing Business with the City Of Chicago
